entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 9 maui Shell.Current.GotoAsync("..") app crash with debugger is attached exception on windows when back from a page that implements map control #26289

Closed

  • Skiasharp version issue in maui 9 #26231
  • CurrentCulture region not read correctly from device (iOS 18.0) #26079
  • MAUI.iOS /usr/bin/codesign exited with code 2: invalid option #22235
  • 'Unable to activate windows store app {id}. The activation request failed with error code "The parameter is incorrect"' #20340
  • Version 17.10.0 will not parse one of my XAML pages in a maui app #23012
  • Update System.Formats.Asn1 #26162
    .NET 9 SR2

PullRequests

Merged

  • [ci] Remove use of System.Formats.Asn1 by removing Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core #26163
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 21 #26168
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • Fix issue with template processing #26196
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 22 #26193
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 23 #26219
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Avoid infinite loop when calculating a DesiredSize #26087
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
